t: Amazon.com: Best of: White Lion: CDs & Vinyl
s: The Best of White Lion is a strong collection gathering pretty much all of the band's best singles and album tracks, including the Top Ten hits "Wait" and "When the Children Cry," plus lesser hits like "Little Fighter" and "Radar Love.".
